attributes.description: Wide selection of quality used Taxis, Buses and other vehicles to choose from at We Buy and Sell Taxis. We specialise in selling the best, refurbished/recon, well looked after vehicles on Cash and Finance. Feel free to contact William on the following Email: info@wbast.co.za, Cell: 072 518 4950 or message me on Whatsapp via same number. You can also call to make an appointment for  viewing and for a Test-drive during normal working hours between 08:00am-17:00pm Monday to Friday, Saturday 08:00am-14:00pm.

attributes.description:
The Toyota Yaris is the ultimate urban sedan. 

Built with bold intention for the dynamic, the curious and the adventure-ready. Fuel efficient so you wont break the bank filling up! Reliable so you will always get to your destination! Safe so you can rest assured! This sedan has it all. Keep moving forward with your Yaris. First come, first serve! Limited stock available.  

All trade ins are welcomed. In house finance is available.
attributes.title: 2009 Toyota Yaris T3+ Auto
